scope.title: Links to Other Datasets
scope.summary: The Post-hospitalisation COVID-19 study (PHOSP-COVID) is collaborating with the National COVID-19 Chest Imaging Database (NCCID). PHOSP-COVID is a national consortium, led by experts at the University Hospitals of Leicester NHS Trust under the umbrella of the NIHR Leicester Biomedical Research Centre.
